alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palatka. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Green Cove Springs, East Palatka, Bostwick, Orange Mills, Bardin, Picolata and Penney Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
